com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial

Class FilteredProximitySearch<V,LS>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.FilteredProximitySearch<V,LS>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The vertex type
    LS - The line string type of vertex geometries

    param: proximitySearch An unfiltered proximity search param: roadAccess Ranges with value true are accessible, while ranges with value false will be interpreted as forbidden param: projection Used to project points onto vertex geometries

    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.ProximitySearch<V>

    public class FilteredProximitySearch<V,LS>
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.ProximitySearch<V>
    Guarantees that all search results are on accessible parts of the road, as defined by roadAccess.

    FilteredProximitySearch uses an unfiltered ProximitySearch instance to perform an initial search. Search results on a fully accessible vertex are returned as they are. Results on a vertex with at least some inaccessible parts cause FilteredProximitySearch to to perform a follow-up search on only that vertex, taking into account the accessibility restrictions.
